arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola admits he 'misses' Jurgen Klopp ahead of Liverpool clash
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola's Manchester City side will take on Liverpool this weekend as the Catalan manages his 1000th game but has got nostalgic over his relationship and rivalry with Jurgen Klopp

arts.ttl: Liverpool will pose a real test for Manchester City on Sunday.
arts.sum: As good as City’s wins over Bournemouth and Dortmund have been, this Sunday’s match at the Etihad against the current Premier League champions will be a real test for a resurgent Manchester City side. So after their recent blip, there are signs that the Premier League champions are beginning to come back to life.

arts.ttl: This is the result Arsenal should want in Man City vs Liverpool on Sunday
arts.sum: Arsenal’s primary Premier League title rivals, Manchester City and Liverpool, meet on Sunday afternoon at the Etihad. The Gunners currently sit six points clear of...

arts.ttl: The champions’ dilemma that left Liverpool and Man City in the same hole
arts.sum: After Man City made the mistake of not changing enough for their 2024 title defence, Arne Slot’s side have fallen into the trap of changing too much

arts.ttl: Man City vs. Liverpool: Three key battles to look out for in PL showdown
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at three key battles to watch out for when Manchester City lock horns with Liverpool in the Premier League on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah's record vs. Manchester City
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at Mohamed Salah's record against Manchester City for Liverpool and Chelsea.
Sports Mole takes a look at Manchester City striker Erling Haaland's record against Liverpool, including overall wins, goals and assists.
